Get the Most from WordPress.com


Whether you are brand new to WordPress.com or you are looking to get up to speed with the latest software changes, we’ve got you covered. 
Building a website is a journey, and you’ll continue to tweak it along the way. To help you achieve your goals, there are several approaches you can take. The intent of this site is to make access to resources as convenient as possible to align with your preferred method of learning and exploring.
Dig in, return often to see what’s new, and most importantly… have fun!


I’d like to learn . . .





Webinars
Our workshops provide live, hands-on experiences with WordPress experts excited to share ideas and features, and answer your questions during a live Q&A.

Site Editing: Custom Headers
Site Editor vs. Page Editor
Compelling Homepages
Webinar Replays

Join a live webinar here →





Courses
Our courses combine multiple tasks to provide a desired outcome. They answer the questions you don’t know you have, and provide step-by-step guidance.

Get Started
Create Your Site
Intro to SEO
Intro to Blogging
Intro to Podcasting

Start a course today →







Go by WordPress.com
This is where experts share their knowledge on building and growing a successful web presence, for those who prefer a more conversational written word.
Browse our articles →





YouTube
Our ever growing YouTube channel is terrific for visual learners who want to see short, on-demand clips on how to work with specific pieces.
Subscribe @WordPressdotcom →




I need help with . . . 





Support Documentation
Find the answers to the questions you know you have. Our robust knowledge base is searchable and is your go-to for the specific steps of a specific task.
Search our support docs here →





Support Forums
Can’t find the exact answer you’re looking for? WordPress experts and staff monitor our support forums to answer your questions.
Education Community Forum →
General Support Forum →




I’d like to upgrade . . .





WordPress.com Plans
All WordPress.com sites are packed with awesome features, including best-in-class hosting, Jetpack essential features to speed up your site performance and protect it from spammers, and a pre-installed SSL certificate ensuring privacy and safety. If you want to take your site to the next level, we suggest exploring our upgraded plan options.
Find your perfect-fit plan here →





Upgrade Now
Access the tools and features you need to tell your story, grow your audience, and make money, with the freedom and flexibility you deserve. Access our experts and a supportive community to help you every step of the way.
Enjoy world-class security, performance, scalability, and support so you can focus on creating and building your brand.
Click here to upgrade your plan today →




Website design service




Hire our dedicated experts to build a handcrafted, personalized website. Share some details about what you’re looking for, and we’ll make it happen.
Start a project here →
